content: A short time later he was assigned to cast his death sentence on Adam Warlock and the Infinity Watch, which led him to Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania where he recruited a local biker gang via his powers of mental and emotional manipulation, to act as his minions. Warlock received a precognitive message from his Soul Gem revealing the imminent threat of Zakaius and his current location, which allowed Pip the Troll to teleport Warlock and the Infinity Watch to the biker bar where Zakaius was. The two sides got into a battle that resulted in Zakaius exploding a tanker truck by accident and Warlock and the Infinity instinctively began rescuing the innocent, which caused Zakaius to question his judgment of all those he had accused of being sinners, including Firelord.
occupation: Former executioner and servant of Domitian
powers: Zakaius was an alien humanoid being possessing a verity of unique powers and abilities. He was able to cause others extreme feelings of joy and tranquility allowing him to get close enough to them to use his is primary power, the "Death-Touch," which means that by merely touching his victim, he would drain them of their life-force and preserve it in a finger-sized stone called a "Life-force Rune". This power collected only life-forces, letting the souls of his victim free to dissipate into the cosmos.
